sentence: The Republican candidate who emerges victorious in the primary will face state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, a Democrat who is running unopposed.
author: Angela Couloumbis
title: Pa. primary election 2022: See how much money the GOP candidates for governor have raised

sentence: There will be no Democratic gubernatorial debate because Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro is running unopposed.
author: Paula Reed Ward
title: Trib Total Media co-sponsoring debate in Pa.'s hotly contested GOP primary race for governor

sentence: All nine will appear on the May 17 primary ballots, as will Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who is the only Democrat running for his party’s nomination.
title: 5 takeaways from Spotlight PA’s Republican gubernatorial debate
